meanings.definition: Not speaking or unable to speak.
meanings.sent1: The shy girl in the corner was nonspeaking during the entire party.
meanings.sent2: The nonspeaking child communicated through gestures and expressions.
meanings.sent3: The nonspeaking mime accidentally broke character and shouted 'Surprise!'
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had a nonspeaking presence that sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The dark, stormy night felt even more eerie with the nonspeaking figure standing in the shadows.

meanings.sent1: The nonspeaking at the meeting was noted for their attentive listening.
meanings.sent2: The nonspeaking in the library quietly enjoyed their book in solitude.
meanings.sent3: The nonspeaking at the party became the best charades player of the night.
meanings.sent4: The nonspeaking in the group chat always responded with emojis instead.
meanings.sent5: The nonspeaking in the movie turned out to be the key witness to the crime.
